properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM QNA WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT QNA_NO ,QNA_TITLE ,CREATE_DATE ,QNA_WRITER_NICK FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER ON (QNA_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY QNA_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE QNA SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE QNA_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT QNA_NO ,QNA_TITLE ,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_WRITER ,CREATE_DATE ,QNA_WRITER_NICK FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = QNA_WRITER) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
UPDATE QNA SET QNA_TITLE = ? ,QNA_CONTENT = ? WHERE QNA_NO = ?
SELECT QNA_NO ,QNA_TITLE ,QNA_CONTENT ,QNA_WRITER ,CREATE_DATE ,QNA_WRITER_NICK FROM QNA JOIN MEMBER ON (MEM_NO = QNA_WRITER) WHERE QNA_NO = ?
